content.raw:
True, there's no good way to get that right now. I actually found out what the URL pattern was by looking at the `ign-fuel-tools` source code :smile: I recommend ticketing an issue [here](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/web-app/issues?status=new&status=open).

Worth mentioning that one thing we've talked about in the past was to support aliases from https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/models to https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/models so that users could use the former on SDF / cli.
content.html:
True, there's no good way to get that right now. I actually found out what the URL pattern was by looking at the ign-fuel-tools source code I recommend ticketing an issue here.

Worth mentioning that one thing we've talked about in the past was to support aliases from https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/fuel/models to https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/models so that users could use the former on SDF / cli.
